welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bel Air North, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, there is a separate terminal available for use at Glenn L Martin Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It features a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as amenities such as lounges and charging stations.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines. It offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as amenities such as charging stations and a pet relief area.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and United. It features a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as amenities such as charging stations and a children's play area.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Spirit. It offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as amenities such as lounges and a currency exchange.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
